title: What do I do when a support decides to troll and farm on me?

replies.body: Maybe get an early {{item:3093}} and build it into a {{item:3087}} after you finish your {{item:3031}} for the waveclear so you can catch up on CS and not fall too behind in terms of gold because of the passive of Avarice blade.

Aggro the minion wave by auto-attacking an Enemy champion then do it again so that their minions get smashed by yours so the wave pushes to the enemy turret then sit back and watch their Jungler come kill him.

Let the enemy auto you to aggro your wave so that your wave aggros his and while your wave is busy aggroing on the enemy your minions will get smashed by theirs, repeat until the wave pushes to your turret then sit back and collect XP and laugh as he can't out last hit turret. Otherwise If the enemy wont auto you because they know you're trying to get your wave pushed, run in to the wave as it comes towards yours and attempt to drag it out and tank it so that the Ranged minions catch up to the melee ones then watch it smash your wave, to the same effect.

If you don't feel like forcing the wave to your turret so that he can try and farm and get poked while you don't have to overextend with a support that is trolling and likely to let you die in fights and you don't feel like forcing the wave to their turret so that the troll gets ganked or has to overextend to farm and most likely gets poked out of lane or has to sit back with you while you now both cant farm, be happy you have a support because the 0 cs support isn't actually always the most gold efficient, considering the there are about 23 Quadrillion blind pick matchups I'm sure there are situations you haven't mathed out where a support with a small amount of gold is actually as useful as an ADC with all the gold or even not more useful having taken farm.

I personally prefer non 0 cs supports and have also had awesome lanes with Bruisers etc and shared farm lanes and with farming supports. Farming supports aren't actually terrible, metasheeping is.

this happened to me once at early game after dorans blade i just got ancient coin so if it got taken i still could make some gold off of it not sure if smart or not but didnt take long for me to recover the money lost on ancient coin and then some

Assuming you're the ADC you should have more AD and more AS than your supp, so you're more likely to get the last hit anyway, just always attack the minions they are trying to kill, sure you'll get a few less CS than usual but its not going to break the game.

I remember a while ago some jungle guy decided to switch to toplane at the last second and decided i should've went mid instead (what our mid should've done, i have no idea).
I shrugged and went top. Got every single lasthit he tried to go for. He eventually vented out (and received just old school trolling for it) and went back to the jungle. Btw, i picked smite for the team, got plenty of MY jungle buffs.

Someone tries to screw you up and he's not *a lot* better than you, he's gonna have a bad time.
And unless the support guy has a full AD page and doran's blade, there's no way he can out-lasthit a proper ADC.

(btw, the game IS probably lost if someone throws at minute 0, but hey, at least you've got a good chance at having him rage [reportable] and leaving [autoban], which is a victory in itself)
